289710.name: Kreed: Battle for Savitar
289710.description:
This took place shortly before the events of Kreed. The second half of the 23rd century became a turning point in human history. The Solar System has been occupied by the bloodthirsty Tiglaari Empire. The actions of this ruthless aggressor are aimed at the extermination of humanity as a species. However, Earth has something to oppose the invaders.

Before you lies the story of a legendary Legion, destined in the distant future to reshape Earth’s civilization and lead its mission among the stars. A future in which humanity will achieve victory in the decisive battle for the Savitar space station.

A future you can change…

Features:

  • The long-awaited sequel to the acclaimed shooter.

  • New locations (Pluto, the Asteroid Belt, the Tiglaari Base, Savitar).

  • New weapon types (shocker, laser sniper rifle).

  • New environmental hazards (poisonous gases, airless space).

  • New special effects.

  • Skeletal animation for enemies.

  • Ability to record gameplay in “demo” mode.

  • Improved lighting.

  • Enhanced AI.

  • New enemies (the Raider race, the Gerdj race, the Tiglaari race).

  • Realistic in-game physics.

We would like to thank our fans for their excellent work in localizing the game into English!

Translation by Sam J.

Voice actors: Luchian D., Jillian Anitova, Bob Nomad.
289710.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
